text:
Klef looks at you with a wry smile. "Very few people have ever beaten me at the game," he says. "No reward I can offer truly expresses my admiration. Nonetheless, I have a couple of items that might interest you."

He places two objects on the table. One is an OCTAGONAL PRISM of coloured glass. The other is a sparkling BLUE ICE JEWEL. "Take both," says Klef. "I feel magnanimous. And now, prepare to enter the nether caverns.

variables: Flickering beams of light shoot from his finger tips, swiftly weaving a web of energy around you. You flinch momentarily before realising that the beams are not hurting you. What then, are they for? You have your answer when you look down. You are sinking to the floor!
